title: When Jesus Saved Her Marriage
itunes:author: Guest: Vicki Rose
itunes:summary:
When it seems hopeless, Jesus will still meet you where you are. Your marriage might be struggling today, but God can do a miracle in your relationship. John and the Smalleys share how they've seen God restore broken marriages.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Vicki Rose's book "Every Reason to Leave (& Why We Chose to Stay Together)" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-17?refcd=1142606

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-jesus-saved-her-marriage/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
